rules.text: Use your brain and think before posting!
No bullying or ad-hominem attacks (but we do respect the fine-line between sarcasm and ad-hominem and we do acknowledge sarcasm as an art as long as it is good-natured)
No doxxing. No threats of physical violence.  No pornography.  No promotion of illegal activities of any kind!
No spamming the site - please make sure your posts are polite, meaningful, and add value.
No repulsive photos and/or gory photos.
Encourage thoughtfulness, creativity, and humor, and shun dullards and barbarians .

records.text: When I first saw this, it brought to mind an incident from about 65 years ago when I was in elementary school and on a writing assignment I wrote a paper defending the second amendment. When I got the graded paper back, the teacher has written a note on it informing me that only the government needed to have guns. It is sad that communistic thinking was already infecting those in the education system that long ago.
